snippet: I think I know now how Bilbo Baggins must have felt in Tolkien's The Hobbit. My companions and I have set out on our own mountainous journey to try to attain a treasure.
abstract: I think I know now how Bilbo Baggins must have felt in Tolkien's The Hobbit. My companions and I have set out on our own mountainous journey to try to attain a treasure.

headline.main: In a Hemingway Idyll, Intimations of Tolkien
headline.print_headline: In Awe of Kilimanjaro, but Now the Real Work Begins
